description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32) Author: Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: UAC Bypass Using Windows Media Player - Registry
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\AppCompatFlags\\Compatibility\ Assistant\\Store\\C\:\\Program\ Files\\Windows\ Media\ Player\\osk.exe AND winlog.event_data.Details:"Binary\ Data")
